alerts.message: Electrical conductivity exceeding recommended level for sensitive crops
recommendations: Monitor crop response in sweet corn field
Consider applying gypsum at 1 t/ha if EC continues to rise

alerts.message: Sodium Adsorption Ratio (SAR) at severe hazard level
recommendations: Do not use for sensitive crops
Blend with canal water at 1:1 ratio if possible

alerts.message: Algae bloom risk developing in Jeyranbatan Reservoir
recommendations: Monitor water for visible algae before pumping
Consider alternating to canal source if available
Install fine mesh filters if using for drip irrigation

alerts.message: Soil salinity moderately affecting cotton field
recommendations: Increase irrigation volume by 15% for leaching
Consider switching to more salt-tolerant variety next season

alerts.message: Elevated iron levels detected in Okhchuchay River
recommendations: Use caution if this is your water source
Install oxidation tank and sand filtration if using for irrigation
Monitor for staining and clogging in irrigation equipment

resolution.note: Levels returned to acceptable range after rainfall dilution
